price: 37. Mpamba te mokolo wana moto na moto akotala sé makambo matali ye-
arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: likulli im'ri-in min'hum yawma-idhin shanun yugh'nīhi
